annonsrubrik: Tcl developer for automated testing in embedded Linux product
annonstext:
Desired Skills & Experience:
- Experience creating automated test cases using Tcl
- Worked with Embedded Linux networking products
- Hands-on experience with git, understanding of git best practices
- Experience with continuous integration and deployment using Jenikins
- Some exposure to Python is a plus

Education & Experience Necessary For Success:

- Master’s degree or equivalent education
- Experience (5-10 years) within testing and/or SW Design
- Experience in automated testing
- Experience in CI/CD using Jenkins or equivalent
- Experience of L2 networking protocols and networking knowledge in general
- Good knowledge in English, written and spoken
- Worked with Spirent or Ixia products

About HiMinds
HiMinds strive to offer their customers the power of innovation. Great technical knowledge is at the core of every HiMind consultant. However, it is the passion for product development and the will to always deliver the highest quality possible that is our main focus.

Our consultants are the best available. Easy to work with and having great knowledge of product development and technical innovations.

At HiMinds you get the opportunity to be a part of the extremely creative and challenging job of improving the customer's products.
